intro.description: This tutorial shows some sample scripts demonstrating CDK functionality in Bioclipse.

item.title: Step 1: Download and visualize proteins
item.description: The following script downloads, opens runs a Gist (95779) to retrieve a PDB via a Web service from the EBI databases, open it with Jmol, and do some custom visualization.

item.title: Step 2: Multiple Molecules
item.description: The following script downloads, opens and runs a Gist (95790) to load multiple molecules from Sample Data (must be installed) and open in MoleculesTable.

item.title: Step 3: Generate 2D, 3D, and 5D
item.description: The following script downloads, opens and runs a Gist (95755) to load multiple molecules from Sample Data (must be installed) and open in MoleculesTable.

item.title: Step 4: Script JCP Editing
item.description: The following script downloads, opens and runs a Gist (96594) to iteratively build a molecule in JCP.
